description: Crown prince of Galra. A dangerous, cunning, and occasionally unstable adversary, Sincline`s brutality rivals even his father`s, his only weakness is the fact that he fell in love with Princess Farla. He is a sly, scheming villain and is Akira`s frequent rival. Like his father, Sincline loses his temper easily and kills his own men with very little provocation.
name: Shinkurain Koutaishi
